## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an x -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows WordPress coding standards
- [ ] No PHP syntax errors (`php -l` passes)
- [ ] All inputs are sanitized
- [ ] All outputs are escaped
- [ ] SQL queries use prepared statements
- [ ] AJAX calls have nonces
- [ ] No console.log in production code (wrapped in debug checks)
- [ ] Error logging respects WP_DEBUG settings

### Documentation
- [ ] Code comments added/updated
- [ ] PHPDoc blocks updated
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG updated (if needed)
- [ ] User-facing docs updated (if needed)

### Testing
- [ ] Tested on fresh WordPress install
- [ ] Tested plugin activation/deactivation
- [ ] Tested related functionality
- [ ] No regressions introduced
- [ ] Edge cases handled

### Security
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] Proper capability checks (if admin feature)
- [ ] Proper nonce verification
- [ ] Input validation implemented
